    • removeCard

      public boolean removeCard(Card card)
      Attempts to remove a specific card instance from the hand. Relies on COMP2033_Project_1_110450836.Card.equals().
      Parameters:
      card - The card instance to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the card was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • playCard

      public Card playCard(Card cardToPlay)
      Finds and removes the specified card, returning it. Useful for playing a card. Maintains sorted order.
      Parameters:
      cardToPlay - The card to find and remove.
      Returns:
      The card that was played.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not in the hand.

    • playCard

      public Card playCard(int index)
      Finds and removes a card at a specific index. Used if selection is by index rather than card object.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to remove.
      Returns:
      The card that was removed.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid.

    • findValidCards

      public List<Card> findValidCards(Card topPileCard, Color chosenWildColor)
      Finds all cards in the hand that can be legally played on the current pile top card.
      Parameters:
      topPileCard - The card currently on top of the pile.
      chosenWildColor - The active chosen wild color, if applicable.
      Returns:
      A List of playable cards (may be empty).

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the cards in the hand. Prevents external modification of the hand's internal list.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of cards.
